intro: Psychotria suterella, commonly known as the Suterella Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, berry-like fruits that are typically green when mature. Psychotria suterella is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests.
